question.title: Transpose File
question.content:
Given a text file file.txt, transpose its content.

You may assume that each row has the same number of columns and each field is separated by the ' ' character.

Example:

If file.txt has the following content:

name age
alice 21
ryan 30

Output the following:

name alice ryan
age 21 30
question.langToValidPlayground: {"cpp": false, "java": false, "python": false, "python3": false, "mysql": false, "mssql": false, "oraclesql": false, "c": false, "csharp": false, "javascript": false, "ruby": false, "bash": false, "swift": false, "golang": false, "scala": false, "html": false, "pythonml": false, "kotlin": false, "rust": false, "php": false}

codeSnippets.code: # Read from the file file.txt and print its transposed content to stdout.
